title: Vanishing Point 1971 480p AspectRatio fixed
description:
I took the much critizided 720x480 release and re-endoded it to the correct aspect ratio (1.85:1). Audio was passthru.

This is the UK release, so the scene with Charlotte Rampling, which was cxut in the US release is present.
